realtime_memories.content: Extraction pipeline: 28 Excel files → 26 properties, 30,394 values across 11 categories. Scheduler runs twice daily (cron: 0 2,14 * * *), file monitor polls SharePoint every 30 min. Config: EXTRACTION_SCHEDULE_ENABLED=true, FILE_MONITOR_ENABLED=true in backend/.env. Initialized in app/main.py lifespan. [Investment Name] is a template placeholder, not real data. Data quality: many properties have 300-600+ errors out of 1,169 fields.
Frontend API config: src/lib/config.ts appends /api/v1 to base URL (VITE_API_URL). src/lib/api.ts and feature hooks import API_URL from config.ts as single source of truth.
User preference: Be extremely clear and explicit about what actions the user needs to take. Don't assume context — state clearly if no action is needed. User prefers directness over hedging.

Dashboard pages wired to real API data (completed). Extraction page done first. All 14 properties updated with real street addresses and coordinates (replacing placeholders). Installed skills: agent-browser, dashboard-creator, using-claude-code-cli.
Property addresses with coordinates provided by user for 14 properties (Alante at the Islands, Alta Surprise, etc.) — stored in database with real lat/long values.
